author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Waseda Academy to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - Waseda Academy Co Ltd
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 150,000 shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between Feb. 23 and March 1
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 300 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/KMDC7d
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
